//Â ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯å¯¹ä¸Šé¢é‚£äº›è·¯ç”±é¡µé¢é‡Œå±•ç¤ºçš„æ€§èƒ½åˆ†ææ•°æ®çš„è§£é‡Š
allocs:Â AÂ samplingÂ ofÂ allÂ pastÂ memoryÂ allocations
block:Â StackÂ tracesÂ thatÂ ledÂ toÂ blockingÂ onÂ synchronizationÂ primitives
cmdline:Â TheÂ commandÂ lineÂ invocationÂ ofÂ theÂ currentÂ program

heap:Â AÂ samplingÂ ofÂ memoryÂ allocationsÂ ofÂ liveÂ objects.Â YouÂ canÂ specifyÂ theÂ gcÂ GETÂ parameterÂ toÂ runÂ GCÂ beforeÂ takingÂ theÂ heapÂ sample.
mutex:Â StackÂ tracesÂ ofÂ holdersÂ ofÂ contendedÂ mutexes
profile:Â CPUÂ profile.Â YouÂ canÂ specifyÂ theÂ durationÂ inÂ theÂ secondsÂ GETÂ parameter.Â AfterÂ youÂ getÂ theÂ profileÂ file,Â useÂ theÂ goÂ toolÂ pprofÂ commandÂ toÂ investigateÂ theÂ profile.
threadcreate:Â StackÂ tracesÂ thatÂ ledÂ toÂ theÂ creationÂ ofÂ newÂ OSÂ threads
trace:Â AÂ traceÂ ofÂ executionÂ ofÂ theÂ currentÂ program.Â YouÂ canÂ specifyÂ theÂ durationÂ inÂ theÂ secondsÂ GETÂ parameter.Â AfterÂ youÂ getÂ theÂ traceÂ file,Â useÂ theÂ goÂ toolÂ traceÂ commandÂ toÂ investigateÂ theÂ trace.
